items.name: service
items.description: The details of the services provided by organizations to a range of different groups.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the service. Each service must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization that provides this service.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The official or public name of the service.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the service.
description.example: Counselling Services provided by trained professionals. Suitable for people with mental health conditions such as anxiety, depression, or eating disorders as well as people experiencing difficult life events and circumstances.

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: An email address which can be used to contact the service provider.

status.name: status
status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the service which can be active, inactive, defunct, or temporarily closed.

fees.name: fees
fees.title: Fees
fees.description: DEPRECATED: Details of any charges for service users to access this service.

accreditations.name: accreditations
accreditations.title: Accreditations
accreditations.description: A free text description of any accreditations. Accreditation is the formal evaluation of an organization or program against best practice standards set by an accrediting organization.
accreditations.example: All of our practitioners are accredited by the BASC, UKCP, and the Professional Standards Body

minimum_age.name: minimum_age
minimum_age.title: Minimum Age
minimum_age.description: The minimum age of a person required to meet this eligibility requirement.

maximum_age.name: maximum_age
maximum_age.title: Maximum Age
maximum_age.description: The maximum age of a person required to meet this eligibility requirement.

assured_date.name: assured_date
assured_date.title: Assured Date
assured_date.description: The date that the information about the service was last checked.

assurer_email.name: assurer_email
assurer_email.title: Assurer Email
assurer_email.description: The contact e-mail address for the person or organization which last assured the service.

alert.name: alert
alert.title: Alert
alert.description: A description of any short term alerts concerning the service.
alert.example: Following COVID-19 we have moved most of our counselling sessions online. Please contact the reception if you require further information.

last_modified.name: last_modified
last_modified.title: Last Modified
last_modified.description: The datetime when the service, or any related information about the service, has changed. Should have millisecond accuracy.

organization.name: organization
organization.description: The details about each organization delivering services. Each service should be linked to the organization responsible for its delivery. One organization may deliver many services.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the organization. Each organization must have a unique identifier.

name.name: name
name.title: Name
name.description: The official or public name of the organization.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description containing a brief summary about the organization. It can contain markup such as HTML or Markdown.
description.example: Example Org is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing services to qualified beneficiaries

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: The contact e-mail address for the organization.

website.name: website
website.title: Website
website.description: The URL (website address) of the organization.

logo.name: logo
logo.title: Logo
logo.description: A URL to an image associated with the organization which can be presented alongside its name.

uri.name: uri
uri.title: URI
uri.description: A persistent identifier to uniquely identify the organization such as those provided by Open Corporates or some other relevant URI provider. This is not for listing the website of the organization: that can be done through the website field of the Organization.

parent_organization_id.name: parent_organization_id
parent_organization_id.title: Parent Organization Identifier
parent_organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization's parent organization.

organization.title: Organization

first_page.description: Is this page the first page.

last_page.description: Is this page the last page.
